comments.body: Hey, guys! ðŸ‘‹ Shouldn't this line (`line #211`) be `width: 0.0,` instead of `height: 0.0,`? ðŸ˜‹ I just tried using `VerticalDivider()`, but since the `height` of the container is set to `0.0`, the divider/border is not rendered.
So it works for us (with a simply test case) locally. Though if you can provide a case where things break, we'd be happy to take a look at it!

Hey, @jslavitz!

So, the following code works for me only if I change that line from `height: 0.0,` to `width: 0.0,`.

```dart
Container(
  height: 24.0,
  child: Row(
    children: <Widget>[
      Text('Hey.'),
      VerticalDivider(),
    ],
  ),
),
```

Does this work for you? ðŸ˜…
Yup, you're right! Not sure why my test didn't trigger this.. I've submitted a PR to fix this here: https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/22641

          margin: EdgeInsetsDirectional.only(start: indent),
          decoration: BoxDecoration(

comments.body: While you're here, remove the extra createBorderSide static and just use the other static
